channel.title: PopMaster
channel.description: Test your pop knowledge with the daily download of Ken Bruce’s tricky music quiz.
channel.itunes:summary: Test your pop knowledge with the daily download of Ken Bruce’s tricky music quiz.
channel.itunes:author: BBC Radio 2

item.title: Slade, Aneka and Europe
item.description: It's Gary Davies in for Ken Bruce with Stuart in Kent vs Ken in Kettering. You can contact Gary for a podcast shout out popmaster@bbc.co.uk
item.itunes:subtitle: It's Gary Davies in for Ken Bruce with Stuart in Kent vs Ken in Kettering.
item.itunes:summary: It's Gary Davies in for Ken Bruce with Stuart in Kent vs Ken in Kettering. You can contact Gary for a podcast shout out popmaster@bbc.co.uk
item.itunes:author: BBC Radio 2

item.title: Champions League: Grand Final
item.description: It's Giancarlo Piccaro and Andy Rimmer fighting it out to be the ultimate PopMaster in the Champions League with Ken Bruce.
item.itunes:subtitle: It's Giancarlo Piccaro and Andy Rimmer fighting it out to be the ultimate PopMaster.
item.itunes:summary: It's Giancarlo Piccaro and Andy Rimmer fighting it out to be the ultimate PopMaster in the Champions League with Ken Bruce.
item.itunes:author: BBC Radio 2

item.title: Champions League 2019: Day One
item.description: It's the first day of Champions League PopMaster with Ken Bruce and Andy Rimmer is the first contestant hoping to lift the trophy for 2019. Plus Ken has a special second round.
item.itunes:subtitle: It's the first day of Champions League PopMaster with Ken Bruce.
